name: Finhay
description:
Finhay is a one-stop-shop for financial services in Vietnam that helps millennials build wealth wisely.

We aim to serve the under-served audience in the market.

Finhay was nominated in Fintech 100 2019 by KPMG, a 1st Runner-Up by Ministry of Science and Technology of Vietnam and Top 10 startups in 2017 at Techfest Vietnam.
